Text:
Nice collection, nice file size... been wanting this for a long time but didn't want to download a 30 something gig file.

It seems that a few of the season 4 videos are out of sync with the audio

Thanks for the upload... will be seeding for a while
For the love of god DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS! It's horrible ;\

Seen the pilot. Audio and video is great.
You can not have high quality expectations of something this old anyway so be glad this is the best you can get :) 

Thanks!

hey manuel08...........some of the video`s audio is out of sync......wat do i gonna Do..!
btw thanx for this great upload
There are no seeders :( I barely download at 10 kB/s. Please seed, I'll do the same when I finish downloading this!

The video quality is good (better than I had expected). The audio is good in the first episodes, then it becomes worst. There are about 30 unsincronized episodes (and many of them can't be fixed becuase like half of the episode's audio is missing). But thanks anyway :)
can u plz fix those vedio and audio in last episodes and upload them plz
